net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.custom.pattern

Interface UiHandlerDetailsForSelection<SELECTION,DETAIL>

  • Type Parameters:
    SELECTION - is the generic type of the individual row from the master panel.
    DETAIL - is the generic type of the actual value representing the <SELECTION> that gets set in the details panel.
    All Superinterfaces:
    UiHandler

    public interface UiHandlerDetailsForSelection<SELECTION,DETAIL>
extends UiHandler
    This is the interface for a UiHandler that allows to get the details for a selection. It is dedicated for AbstractUiWidgetCustomMasterDetail and allows to display a reduced list of data objects in master list with (lazy) loading of the details via this handler. This interface should typically be implemented by the controller (if it calls services on the server).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DETAIL getDetailsForSelection(SELECTION selection)
      This method gets the <DETAIL> for the given <SELECTION>.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailsForSelection

        DETAIL getDetailsForSelection(SELECTION selection)
        This method gets the <DETAIL> for the given <SELECTION>.
        Parameters:
        selection - is the object that has just been selected (in AbstractUiWidgetCustomMasterDetail.getMasterList()).
        Returns:
        is the detail object to view or edit in AbstractUiWidgetCustomMasterDetail.getDetailPanel().
